text: (nirakarikkum) ivarkal pumiyil currit tirintu parkkavillaiya? Appotu, avarkalukku munniruntavarkalin mutivu evvarayirru enpataik kantukolvarkal. Avarkal, ivarkalai vita makkal tokaiyil atikamanavarkalakavum palattalum, pumiyil vittuc cenra (purva) cinnankalalum mikaittavarkalakavum iruntarkal. Eninum, avarkal teti cekarittu vaittiruntavarril onrume avarkalukkup payanalikkavillai
